content: lion brand pattern # cwe-sweater skill level advanced beginner size small medium large 1x directions are for sizes small medium large x-large finished bust 42 46 51 55½ inches #660 wool-ease sportweight *discontinued* 1305-2175 yards *sportweight yarn may be substituted * crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm gauge 3 single_crochet = 1 inches 1 pat repeat = 2-1/3 inches wide x 3 inches high pieces front back sleeves 2 worked in 4-row pattern features picot trim on edges
